result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Derek M. Goheen

records.addlTxt:
2:38 PM Attorney Drew Lehman in court for State of Wisconsin. Defendant Derek M. Goheen in court.  Attorney Zachary Caley in court for Derek M. Goheen. Clerk N. Nobile.
MINUTES: Victim rights compliance. Matter is resolved and Attorney Caley is requesting a plea and sentencing date.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for November 9, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Final pre-trial on September 28, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
No disposition. Leave on for next scheduled court activity.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt:
PROPER ATTIRE REQUIRED.  NO SHORTS OR TANK TOPS ALLOWED IN COURTROOM.
*No Weapons especially firearms.  No contact including the residence, electronic or 3rd party with: Nicole A. V.  The DE may make arrangements with a party or law enforcement to retrieve personal property and/or medication from the victim's N.A.V.'s residence within 24 hours of signing the bond in this case.  The DE may not be the party retrieving any property and/or medication.  *Not To Discuss Case w/ Jessica G.

02:43 PM   Assistant District Attorney Daniel Bernard Deida appeared for the State.   Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Chad Shamali.   Clerk JT  Minutes:   The Court finds probable cause in this case today.   Plea of Not Guilty entered. Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 12, 2022 at 01:40 pm.  Final pre-trial scheduled for September 8, 2022 at 09:00 am. $1000 Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event). mi
